segments.text: The adult woman near the sink continues her task, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, her focus unwavering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is now completely engulfing her foot, yet she remains entirely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of distraction is frankly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so detached from their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water against her skin?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s not just the water; she’s also missing the children’s risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could fall from that stool at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout to her to look around!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her negligence could lead to serious injury or damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's utterly maddening to witness such an obvious disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope she notices soon before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
